QuestData.Title: Dargrul and the Hammer
QuestData.Description: We are about to follow a drogbar into a cave, something we warn our children never to do.$b$bEven so, several of our warbraves have already followed Dargrul inside.$b$bCome, join us in battle and let us reclaim the Hammer of Khaz'goroth.
QuestData.RewardText: Oro and the others? Did they make it out as well?$b$bSuch destruction. So many good warbraves have fallen today.$b$bIt is clear now, we will need the full might of the Highmountain tribes if we are to recover the hammer.
